row.SQL_SELECT: select 'XS@@yhdm,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) from backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate()) and note_type='XS'
row.SQL_INSERT: INSERT INTO backdetails(PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,disaccount_price,product_id,zk,back_reason,ware_code,fact_num,fact_amount,pxh,pack_num,type_agent,type_ls,product_mj,store_num) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@back_code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,convert(decimal(12,2),(dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@jglx,','@@agent_code,',id)*dbo.getOrderZK('@@qyzk,',series_code))/100) PRODUCT_PRICE1,'@@product_num,' Back_NUM,'@@product_num,'*convert(decimal(12,2),(dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@jglx,','@@agent_code,',id)*dbo.getOrderZK('@@qyzk,',series_code))/100) AMOUNT,'@@yhdm,','',PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@jglx,','@@agent_code,',id) Product_Price,id,dbo.getOrderZK('@@qyzk,',series_code),'','','@@product_num,' Fact_NUM,'@@product_num,'*convert(decimal(12,2),(dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@jglx,','@@agent_code,',id)*dbo.getOrderZK('@@qyzk,',series_code))/100) Fact_AMOUNT,(select case '@@d_pxh,' when '' then isnull(max(pxh)+10,0) else @@d_pxh,-1 end from backdetails where back_code='@@back_code,') pxh,pack_num,type_agent,product_price,product_mj,0 FROM product_list WHERE id='@@product_id,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: insert into bt_list(back_code,bt_amount,bt_code,bt_date,bt_type) select '@@back_code,','@@bt_amount,',back_code,getdate(),sfsf from backlist where note_type='BT' and back_code='@@bt_code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: insert into backlist(Back_Code,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Back_Amount,Back_Date,Arr_Date,Back_Sts,Back_Demo,Note_Type,Opr_Man,Opr_Dw,JSDH,Back_Type,YWY,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,Dis_Amount,Dised_Amount,Account_Amount,Taf_Amount,Brand_Code,qyzk,djlx,exp_name,order_code) select '@@back_code,',agent_code,'@@order_num,','@@order_amount,',getdate(),getdate(),'0','@@bz,','XS','@@xm,',agent_code,'','0',(select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where yhh=domain_man) yhxm,'@@arr_man,','@@arr_tel,','@@arr_address,','0','0',agent_amount,'0',Brand_Code,QYZK,'标准','@@exp_name,','@@order_code,' from agent_list where agent_code='@@agent_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into backlist(Back_Code,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Back_Amount,Back_Date,Arr_Date,Back_Sts,Back_Demo,Note_Type,Opr_Man,Opr_Dw,sfsf,arr_address,ywy,tis_amount,jsdh) select 'SK'+right(convert(varchar,replace(replace(replace(replace(convert(varchar,getdate(),121),'-',''),':',''),' ',''),'.',''))+substring(convert(varchar,rand()),3,3),16) back_code, '@@Agent_Code,','0','@@Order_Amount,',getdate(),'','5','货款','SK','@@YHDM,','@@Agent_Code,','','@@BankName,',domain_man xm,'@@Order_Amount,','@@jsdh,' from agent_list where agent_code='@@Agent_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists (select * from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS='@@lxfs,') begin insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,bm,lxfs,dz,dzjc,yhjb,qx_mob_sj,qx_mob_dp,qx_mob_cd) select upper('@@agent_code,')+dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(yhh,3))+1,1)) yhh,'终端店面','@@yhxm,','@@agent_code,','@@warecode,' warecode,'25ed1bcb423b0b7200f485fc5ff71c8e' mm,'0','2038-12-30' yxq,'@@zw,','@@lxfs,','@@arr_address,','@@brand_name,','@@yhjb,','''@@lxfs,''','''@@agent_code,''','''0106'',''0201'',''0206''' from TJ_SYS_YH a where DEPT='@@agent_code,' update tj_sys_yh set qx_mob_sj=qx_mob_sj+',''@@lxfs,''' where dept='@@agent_code,' and yhjb in ('老板','财务') end else update TJ_SYS_YH set YHXM='@@yhxm,',DEPT='@@agent_code,',dzjc='@@brand_name,',LXFS='@@lxfs,',dz='@@arr_address,',zw='@@zw,',yhjb='@@yhjb,' where yhh='@@yhh,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into ordercol(ordercode,col_date,col_amount,col_memo,col_man,out_trade_no,trade_status,cashier_trade_no,operator,pay_type,pay_info) values('@@ordercode,',getdate(),'@@col_amount,','@@col_memo,','@@col_man,','@@out_trade_no,','@@trade_status,','@@cashier_trade_no,','@@operator,','@@pay_type,','@@pay_info,') if exists (select * from orderlist where order_code='@@ordercode,' and order_date is null) update orderlist set order_date=getdate(),order_sts='0',djje='@@col_amount,' where order_code='@@ordercode,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into OrderBound(Order_Code,bound,bound_Date,Bound_Type,Bound_Memo,opr_tel,opr_man,rev_tel,rev_man,payment_no,open_id) values('@@order_code,','@@bound,',GETDATE(),'打赏','@@bound_memo,','@@opr_tel,','@@username,','@@rev_tel,','@@rev_man,','@@payment_no,','@@open_id,') insert into OrderCharge(Agent_Code,ChargeCode,OrderCode,Charge_Date,Init_Amount,Charge_Amount,Store_Amount,Charge_Memo,charge_man,payment_no,open_id,rev_tel,rev_man) select top 1 agent_code,'@@order_code,','',GETDATE(),agent_amount,'-@@bound,',agent_amount+'-@@bound,' store_amount,'打赏','@@username,','@@payment_no,','@@open_id,','@@rev_tel,','@@rev_man,' from Agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,' update agent_list set agent_amount=isnull(agent_amount,0)+'-@@bound,' where agent_code='@@agent_code,' end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update orderproduct set ysl='@@ysl,',is_send=case SIGN(curr_kcsl-'@@ysl,') when 0 then '库存充足' when 1 then '库存充足' when -1 then '库存不够' end where id='@@id,'
row.TZNR: select '收到赏金:@@username,给你打赏了@@bound,元钱，赶紧去微信零钱包里瞧瞧吧！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'' ordercode,'收到赏金' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS='@@rev_tel,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: if not exists (select * from giftsel_mx where back_code='@@back_code,' and spbm='@@id,' and (sl+'@@sl,') <= 0) update GIFTSEL_MX set SL=sl+'@@sl,',JE=je+('@@sl,'*DJ) where Back_Code='@@back_code,' and SPBM='@@id,' else delete from giftsel_mx where spbm='@@id,' and back_code='@@back_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin if not exists (select * from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,') insert into backlist(Back_Code,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Back_Date,Arr_Date,Back_Sts,Back_Demo,Note_Type,Opr_Man,Opr_Dw,JSDH,Back_Type,YWY,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,Dis_Amount,Dised_Amount,Tis_Amount,Account_Amount,Taf_Amount,Brand_Code,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,qt_amount,qyzk,djlx,arr_fax,lgjy,pro_amount,wl_amount) select '@@Back_Code,',agent_code,'0',getdate(),GETDATE(),'9','','XS','@@LS.XM,',agent_code,'','0',DOMAIN_MAN, CONTACT_MAN,agent_tel,AGENT_ADDRESS,'0','0','0',Agent_Amount,'0',brand_code,0,0,0,0,0,qyzk,'标准',AGENT_FAX,'0','0','0' from agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@LS.DWDM,' delete from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_type='代金券' delete from djquse_mx where sl<=0 and back_code='@@Back_Code,' INSERT INTO backdetails(PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,disaccount_price,product_id,zk,back_reason,ware_code,fact_num,fact_amount,pxh,store_num,pack_memo,check_num,store_no,product_attr) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code,' back_code,PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl, product_price*@@QYZK,/100 product_price,sl*mfsl Back_NUM,sl*mfsl*product_price*@@QYZK,/100 AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,','代金券',PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,Product_Price,a.id,100,'代金券购买','',sl*mfsl Fact_NUM,sl*mfsl*product_price Fact_AMOUNT,(select isnull(max(pxh)+10,0) from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,') pxh,0,convert(varchar,pack_num)+product_untl+'/'+pack_type pack_memo,use_id,store_no,product_attr FROM product_list a,djquse_mx b WHERE a.ID=b.SPBM and b.back_code='@@Back_Code,' end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update agent_list set AGENT_NAME='@@agent_name,',AGENT_ADDRESS='@@agent_address,',AGENT_TEL='@@agent_tel,',CONTACT_MAN='@@contact_man,',Agent_Area='@@agent_area,',is330KH='@@is330kh,',YYMJ='@@yymj,',Join_Date='@@join_date,',End_Date='@@end_date,',QYZK='@@qyzk,',sign_man='@@sign_man,',sign_sfz='@@sign_sfz,',account_man='@@account_man,',spk='@@spk,' where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from djquse_mx where Back_Code ='@@Back_Code,' delete from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' and back_type='代金券' end

row.SQL_DELETE: insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,bm,lxfs,yhjb,bz,dzjc,qx_mob_dp,qx_mob_sj) select upper('@@agent_code,')+(select dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(yhh,3))+1,1)) from TJ_SYS_YH where DEPT='@@agent_code,') yhh,'终端店面',yhxm,'@@agent_code,','@@brand_code,' warecode, mm,'0','2038-12-30' yxq,'8889','@@lxfs,','导购','','','''@@agent_code,''','''@@lxfs,''' from WeiXinAppUser_Open where lxfs='@@lxfs,'
row.TZNR: select '员工加入：@@yhxm, 想加入到你店中来，给你店一点力量，请到员工组里接受她吧！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'' ordercode,'员工加入' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb='老板'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) values('@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','完工拍照') update orderlist set order_sts='5',dh_sts='已安装',zjlxsj=getdate(),ismeter='已测量',az_man='@@track_man,',az_sjdate=dbo.getdatetime(getdate()) where order_code='@@ordercode,' if not exists (select * from OrderSrv where Order_Code='@@ordercode,' and srv_type='安装') insert into OrderSrv(Order_Code,agent_code,arr_man,arr_address,arr_tel,Srv_Date,Srv_Man,srv_mantel,Srv_result,srv_sjdate,srv_type,srv_sts) select ORDER_CODE,AGENT_CODE,arr_man,arr_address,arr_tel,GETDATE(),'@@track_man,','@@track_tel,','@@srv_result,',GETDATE(),'安装','2' from orderlist where ORDER_CODE='@@ordercode,' else update OrderSrv set Srv_Sts='2',srv_sjdate=GETDATE(),srv_result='@@srv_result,' where srv_type='安装' and Order_Code='@@ordercode,' end
row.TZNR: select arr_man+' 家的订单已安装完工，回访有惊喜!' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@ordercode,' ordercode,'安装完工' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a ,OrderList b where a.LXFS=b.YWY_TEL and order_code='@@ordercode,'

row.SQL_INSERT: update orderlist set order_date=getdate(),order_amount='@@order_amount,',order_sts='3' where order_code='@@order_code,'

insert into orderlist(order_code,groom_date,ywy_tel,opr_dw,note_type,order_sts,agent_code,groom_memo,ywy,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,zjlxsj,yjlxsj,order_src,cust_name,housetype,sex) select top 1 '@@KEY,',getdate(),'@@opr_tel,','','Z','9','@@agent_code,','@@demo,','@@username,','@@arr_man,','@@arr_tel,','@@arr_address,',getdate(),dateadd(DAY,3,GETDATE()),'@@order_src,','@@agent_name,','@@housetype,','@@sex,' from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@opr_tel,'

begin insert into OrderCol(OrderCode,Col_Date,Col_Amount,col_memo,col_man) values('@@order_code,',GETDATE(),'@@col_amount,','订金','@@col_man,') update OrderList set order_sts='0',order_date=getdate(),zjlxsj=getdate() where order_code='@@order_code,' insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) select '@@KEY,',order_code,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,'@@col_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'已成交，收取定金:@@col_amount,','定金收取' from OrderList where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' end
row.TZNR: select '收款提醒：客户'+arr_man+'的订金@@col_amount,已入账，收款人：@@col_man,' nr, '@@col_memo,' token1,lxfs msgTel,'@@col_amount,' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'收款提醒' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a ,OrderList b where a.dept=b.AGENT_CODE and ( yhjb='老板' or YWY_TEL=lxfs ) and order_code='@@order_code,' union select '成交提醒：您带给 @@shopname, 的订单已成交，准备接收赏金吧！' nr, '@@col_memo,' token1,lxfs msgTel,'@@col_amount,' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'成交提醒' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS in (select top 1 opr_tel from orderlist where order_code='@@order_code,')

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) values('@@KEY,','@@order_code,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'销售合同已敲定，合同金额：@@order_amount, 定稿设计图如下：','定稿拍照') if CONVERT(decimal(12,2),'@@col_amount,') != 0 insert into OrderCol(OrderCode,Col_Date,Col_Amount,col_memo,col_man) values('@@order_code,',GETDATE(),'@@col_amount,','货款','@@col_man,') update orderlist set order_date=getdate(),order_amount='@@order_amount,',order_sts='3',zjlxsj=getdate() where order_code='@@order_code,' end
row.TZNR: select '签约提醒：客户(@@custname,@@cust_tel,)，合同已签订，合同金额@@order_amount,元。' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'签约提醒' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where DEPT in (select top 1 agent_code from orderlist where order_code='@@order_code,') and yhjb='老板'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin if '@@srv_type,' ='安装' update OrderList set az_Man='@@az_man,',az_tel='@@az_tel,',az_date='@@az_date,' where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' else update OrderList set cl_Man='@@az_man,',cl_tel='@@az_tel,',cl_date='@@az_date,',isMeter='测量中' where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update OrderSrv set Srv_Sts='1' where ID='@@id,'
row.TZNR: select '任务：店里指派了一个订单，请尽快处理！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'任务' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where lxfs='@@az_tel,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) values('@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'测量拍照','测量拍照') if not exists (select * from OrderSrv where Order_Code='@@ordercode,' and srv_type='测量') insert into OrderSrv(Order_Code,agent_code,arr_man,arr_address,arr_tel,Srv_Date,Srv_Man,srv_mantel,Srv_result,srv_sjdate,srv_type,srv_sts) select ORDER_CODE,AGENT_CODE,arr_man,arr_address,arr_tel,GETDATE(),'@@track_man,','@@track_tel,','@@srv_result,' ,GETDATE(),'测量','2' from orderlist where ORDER_CODE='@@ordercode,' else update OrderSrv set Srv_Sts='2',srv_sjdate=GETDATE(),srv_result='@@srv_result,' where srv_type='测量' and Order_Code='@@ordercode,' update orderlist set isMeter='已测量',cl_sjdate=dbo.getdatetime(getdate()),cl_man='@@track_man,' where order_code='@@ordercode,' end
row.TZNR: select '测量完工：客户('+arr_man+arr_tel+')的房屋已经测量完工,测量人：@@track_man,！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@ordercode,' ordercode,'测量完工' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a ,OrderList b where a.LXFS=b.YWY_TEL and order_code='@@ordercode,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists (select * from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS='@@lxfs,') begin insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,bm,lxfs,yhjb,bz,dzjc,wx_headimage,wx_nick,wx_openid,wx_code,qx_mob_sj,qx_mob_dp,qx_mob_cd) select upper('@@agent_code,')+(select dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(yhh,3))+1,1)) from TJ_SYS_YH where DEPT='@@agent_code,') yhh,'终端店面','@@yhxm,','@@agent_code,','@@brand_code,' warecode,'@@PASSWORD2,' mm,'0','2038-12-30' yxq,'8889','@@lxfs,','@@yhjb,','@@bz,','@@dzjc,','@@wx_headimage,','@@wx_nick,','@@wx_openid,','@@wx_code,','''@@lxfs,''','''@@agent_code,''','''0106'',''0201'',''0206''' update tj_sys_yh set qx_mob_sj=qx_mob_sj+',''@@lxfs,''' where dept='@@agent_code,' and yhjb in ('老板','财务') end else update TJ_SYS_YH set WX_headimage='@@wx_headimage,',WX_nick='@@wx_nick,',WX_OpenID='@@wx_openid,',WX_Code='@@wx_code,' where LXFS='@@lxfs,'
row.TZNR: select '@@dzjc,的 @@yhxm, 已成功成为你店的带单员，你可到 员工 里面查看她的信息。如她没安装客串串APP，请指导她安装客串串APP.' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'' ordercode,'员工加盟' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb='老板'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into OrderCharge(Agent_Code,ChargeCode,OrderCode,Charge_Date,Init_Amount,Charge_Amount,Store_Amount,Charge_Memo,charge_man,payment_no,open_id) select top 1 agent_code,'@@KEY,','',GETDATE(),agent_amount,'@@charge_amount,',agent_amount+'@@charge_amount,' store_amount,'@@charge_memo,','@@charge_man,','@@payment_no,','@@open_id,' from Agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,' update agent_list set agent_amount=isnull(agent_amount,0)+'@@charge_amount,' where agent_code='@@agent_code,' end
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin insert into OrderCharge(Agent_Code,ChargeCode,OrderCode,Charge_Date,Init_Amount,Charge_Amount,Store_Amount,Charge_Memo,charge_man,payment_no,open_id,rev_tel,rev_man,account) select top 1 '' dept,'@@KEY,','',GETDATE(),isnull(yh_amount,0) yh_amount,'@@charge_amount,',isnull(yh_amount,0)+'@@charge_amount,' store_amount,'@@charge_memo,','@@charge_man,','@@payment_no,','@@open_id,',LXFS,yhxm,lxfs from weixinappuser_open where lxfs='@@lxfs,' update weixinappuser_open set yh_amount=isnull(yh_amount,0)+'@@charge_amount,' where lxfs='@@lxfs,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into orderlist(order_code,groom_date,Opr_Man,opr_dw,note_type,order_sts,agent_code,groom_memo,ywy,ywy_tel,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,opr_tel,opr_token,zjlxsj,yjlxsj,cust_name) select replace(newid(),'-','') order_code,getdate() groom_date,'@@username,' Opr_Man,'@@username,(@@shopname,)' opr_dw,note_type,'9' order_sts,dept agent_code,'@@groom_memo,' groom_memo,yhxm ywy,lxfs ywy_tel,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,'@@opr_tel,' opr_tel,'@@opr_token,' opr_token,getdate() zjlxsj,dateadd(DAY,3,GETDATE()) yjlxsj,(select top 1 agent_name from agent_list where agent_code=b.dept) cust_name from OrderList a,TJ_SYS_YH b where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' and b.LXFS in(@@all_lxfs,)
row.TZNR: select '客户推荐：@@shopname, 的 @@username, 推荐了一个客户给你，打开客串串到抢单池里抢单吧！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'客户分享' msgtype from OrderList a,TJ_SYS_YH b where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' and b.LXFS in(@@all_lxfs,) and YHJB in ('导购') and device_token is not null and device_token!='' union all select '客户分享：@@shopname,的@@username,分享了一个客户给你，快去跟单列表里瞧瞧吧！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'客户分享' msgtype from OrderList a,TJ_SYS_YH b where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' and b.LXFS in(@@all_lxfs,) and YHJB in ('店长','老板') and device_token is not null and device_token!=''

row.SQL_INSERT: update TJ_SYS_YH set longitude='@@longtiude,',latitude='@@latitude,',position='@@position,' where LXFS='@@agent_tel,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin insert into WorkTrack(track_id,agentcode,agentName,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_address,track_type,lon,lat,clock_time) select right(convert(varchar,replace(replace(replace(replace(convert(varchar,'@@dataStr,',121),'-',''),':',''),' ',''),'.',''))+substring(convert(varchar,rand()),3,3),16) ,'@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,','@@dataStr,','@@track_content,','@@track_address,','@@track_type,','@@lon,','@@lat,','@@clock_time,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into WorkTrack(track_id,agentcode,agentName,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_address,track_type,lon,lat,clock_time) values('@@KEY,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','@@track_address,','@@track_type,','@@lon,','@@lat,','@@clock_time,') end
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin if( exists (select * from worktrack where track_sjid='@@track_sjid,' and track_tel='@@track_tel,' and agreeflag='赞')) delete from worktrack where track_sjid='@@track_sjid,' and track_tel='@@track_tel,' and agreeflag='赞' else insert into WorkTrack(track_id,agentcode,agentName,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_address,track_type,lon,lat,track_sjid,agreeflag) values('@@KEY,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','@@track_address,','@@track_type,','@@lon,','@@lat,','@@track_sjid,','@@agreeflag,') end
row.SQL_DELETE: if not exists ( select * from WorkTrack where Track_Tel='@@track_tel,' and dbo.getdatestr1(Track_Date)=dbo.getDateStr1(GETDATE()) and Track_Type='@@track_type,' ) begin insert into WorkTrack(track_id,agentcode,agentName,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_address,track_type,lon,lat,clock_time) values('@@KEY,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','@@track_address,','@@track_type,','@@lon,','@@lat,','@@clock_time,') insert into EmpTrack(track_id,agentcode,agentName,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_address,track_type,lon,lat,clock_time) values('@@KEY,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','@@track_address,','@@track_type,','@@lon,','@@lat,','@@clock_time,') end

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into kcc_fee (lxfs,agent_code,end_date,pay_no,sts,bz) select LXFS,DEPT,end_date,'','申请中','' from tj_sys_yh where LXFS='@@lxfs,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update kcc_fee set pay_month='@@pay_month,',pay_amount='@@pay_month,'*50,after_date=DATEADD(mm,@@pay_month,end_date) where pay_id='@@pay_id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: update Agent_list set SB_Time='@@sb_time,',XB_Time='@@xb_time,',Lon='@@lon,',Lat='@@lat,',AGENT_ADDRESS='@@agent_address,' where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update OrderList set Arr_Man='@@arr_man,',Arr_Tel='@@arr_tel,',Arr_Address='@@arr_address,',level='@@level,',order_amount='@@order_amount,',az_date='@@az_date,',order_memo='@@order_memo,',opr_man='@@opr_man,',opr_tel='opr_tel,' where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into orderlist(order_code,groom_date,ywy_tel,opr_dw,note_type,order_sts,agent_code,groom_memo,ywy,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,zjlxsj,yjlxsj,order_src,cust_name,housetype,az_date,order_date,order_amount,ismeter,fph) select top 1 '@@KEY,',getdate(),'@@opr_tel,','','Z','5','@@agent_code,','@@demo,','@@username,','@@arr_man,','@@arr_tel,','@@arr_address,',getdate(),dateadd(DAY,3,GETDATE()),'@@order_src,','@@agent_name,','@@housetype,','@@az_date,','@@az_date,','@@order_amount,','已测量','历史订单' from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@opr_tel,'

begin insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) select '@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),case '@@isrepair,' when '完工' then '维修完工，照片如下：' else '@@track_content,' end track_content,'@@isrepair,' update orderlist set zjlxsj=getdate(),isrepair= '@@isrepair,' where order_code='@@ordercode,' if '@@isrepair,'='完工' begin update orderlist set srv_tel=NULL where order_code='@@ordercode,' end end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update OrderList set srv_Man='@@srv_man,',srv_tel='@@srv_tel,',srv_date='@@srv_date,' where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: delete from ordertrack where track_id='@@track_id,'
row.TZNR: select '售后任务：店里分配了售后维修任务，需要处理，请尽快去处理！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'@@order_code,' ordercode,'售后任务' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where lxfs='@@srv_tel,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into orderlist(order_code,groom_date,Opr_Man,opr_dw,note_type,order_sts,agent_code,groom_memo,ywy,ywy_tel,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,opr_tel,opr_token,zjlxsj,yjlxsj,cust_name,order_src) select replace(newid(),'-','') order_code,getdate() groom_date,'@@username,' Opr_Man,'@@shopname,' opr_dw,note_type,'9' order_sts, b.agent_code,'@@groom_memo,' groom_memo,'' ywy,'' ywy_tel,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,'@@opr_tel,' opr_tel,'@@opr_token,' opr_token,getdate() zjlxsj,dateadd(DAY,3,GETDATE()) yjlxsj,agent_name,'联盟推荐' from OrderList a,agent_list b where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' and b.agent_code in (@@all_agentcode,) update orderlist set tjcs=isnull(tjcs,0)+1 where order_code='@@order_code,' end
row.TZNR: select '推荐客户：@@shopname,的 @@username, 推送了意向客户('+arr_man+arr_tel+')到您的店中，赶紧打开客串串抢单吧！ ' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'' ordercode,'客户分享' msgtype from OrderList a,TJ_SYS_YH b where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,' and b.dept in (@@all_agentcode,) and YHJB in ('店长','老板','超级老板','导购') and device_token is not null and device_token!='' and device_token!='(null)'
row.KJSM: 收款后直接分享到联盟

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into zxd_zb (id,rq,bz,jbrmc,id_phd,ckmc,dwbm,dwmc,zy) select (select isnull(max(CONVERT(int,id)),0)+1 from zxd_zb where id_phd='@@phd_id,'),GETDATE(),'零散','@@xm,','@@phd_id,',ckmc,dwbm,dwmc,'@@zy,' from phd_zb where id='@@phd_id,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: insert into zxd_mx(id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,sccj,psid,jldw,sl,bz,ph_id,phd_id,back_id,back_code,store_no,cd,series_code) select '@@zxh,' id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,'@@sccj,',psid,jldw,'@@sl,' sl,bz,ph_id,ID phd_id,'' back_id,back_code,store_no,cd,series_code from phd_mx_hz a where PH_id='@@ph_id,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from ZXD_MX where zx_id='@@zx_id,' if not exists (select * from zxd_mx where id='@@id,' and phd_id='@@phd_id,') delete from zxd_zb where id='@@id,' and id_phd='@@phd_id,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content) values('@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,')
row.SQL_UPDATE: delete from ZXD_ZB where ID not in (select ID from ZXD_MX where PHD_ID='@@phd_id,') and id_phd='@@phd_id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: update zxd_zb set zy='@@xz_type,' where id='@@zx_id,' and id_phd='@@phd_id,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin update PHD_MX set SL=0 where id='@@phd_id,' update PHD_MX set SL=b.sl from PHD_MX a,(select PH_ID,SUM(sl) sl from ZXD_MX where phd_id='@@phd_id,' group by PH_ID ) b where a.ph_id=b.PH_ID update PHD_ZB set isJD='已结单',sh='F' where ID='@@phd_id,' end
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from zxd_zb where id='@@id,' and id_phd='@@phd_id,' delete from zxd_mx where id='@@id,' and phd_id='@@phd_id,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: update PHD_ZB set BZ=BZ+'@@bz,' where ID='@@phd_id,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin update PHD_MX set ID='@@phd_id,' where ID='@@s_phd_id,' update PHD_MX_HZ set ID='@@phd_id,' where ID='@@s_phd_id,' update PHD_ZB set isJD='已合并@@phd_id,' where ID='@@s_phd_id,' end
row.SQL_DELETE: begin update PHD_MX_hz set ID='@@phd_id,',src_phd_id='@@s_phd_id,',ishb='合并' where id='@@s_phd_id,' update PHD_MX set ID='@@phd_id,',src_phd_id='@@s_phd_id,',ishb='合并' where id='@@s_phd_id,' update PHD_zb set isjd='已合并',sh='T' where id='@@s_phd_id,' end

row.SQL_UPDATE: if not exists(select * from brand_list where brand_name='@@brand_name,') insert into Brand_List(Brand_Name,brand_chnname,Brand_Type,brand_sts) select '@@brand_name,','@@brand_name,','@@brand_type,','启用'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo,product_id,fault) select '@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','报修','@@product_id,','@@fault,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) select '@@KEY,','@@ordercode,','@@custname,','@@cust_tel,','@@track_man,','@@track_tel,',GETDATE(),'@@track_content,','回访'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin update ordertrack set track_memo='完工' where track_id='@@ordercode,' update OrderSrv set Srv_Sts='2',srv_sjdate=GETDATE(),srv_result='@@srv_result,' where Order_Code='@@ordercode,' end

if not exists (select * from WeiXinAppUser where LXFS='@@lxfs,' and agent_code=(select top 1 dept from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@agent_tel,')) insert into WeiXinAppUser(YHXM,LXFS,design_company,share_type,xb,sr,DZ,ywy,ywy_tel,agent_code,gzjy,card_no) select '@@yhxm,','@@lxfs,','@@design_company,','@@share_type,','@@xb,','@@sr,','@@dz,',YHXM,LXFS,dept,'@@gzjy,','@@card_no,' from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS='@@agent_tel,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update WeiXinAppUser set yhxm='@@yhxm,',xb='@@xb,',sr='@@sr,',LXFS='@@lxfs,',DZ='@@dz,',share_type='@@share_type,',design_company='@@design_company,',ywy='@@ywy,',ywy_tel='@@ywy_tel,',gzjy='@@gzjy,',card_no='@@card_no,' where YHID='@@yhid,'
row.SQL_DELETE: delete from weixinappuser where yhid='@@yhid,'
row.TZNR: select '@@lxfs,' mobliecode,'SMS_66335010' templatecode,'@@yhxm,' param1,agent_name param2,'' param3,'' param4,'' param5 from agent_list where agent_code=(select top 1 dept from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@agent_tel,')

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into orderlist(order_code,groom_date,Opr_Man,opr_dw,opr_tel,note_type,order_sts,agent_code,order_memo,order_src,ywy,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address,ht_amount,ywy_tel,housetype) select lower(replace(newid(),'-','')) key1,GETDATE(),'@@opr_man,','@@opr_dw,','@@opr_tel,','Z','9',agent_code,'@@order_memo,','微信推荐','',agent_name,'@@arr_man,' ,'@@arr_tel,','@@arr_address,','0','','普通' from agent_list where agent_code in (@@agent_code,)
row.SQL_UPDATE: if not exists (select * from weixinappuser_open where lxfs='@@lxfs,') insert into weixinappuser_open(wx_openid,WX_headimage,wx_nick,wx_code,lxfs,yhxm) values('@@wx_openid,','@@wx_headimage,','@@wx_nick,','@@wx_code,','@@lxfs,','@@yhxm,') else update weixinappuser_open set yhxm='@@yhxm,',WX_headimage='@@wx_headimage,',WX_nick='@@wx_nick,',WX_Code='@@wx_code,',wx_openid='@@wx_openid,' where lxfs='@@lxfs,'
row.SQL_DELETE: if not exists (select * from WeiXinAppUser where LXFS='@@lxfs,' and agent_code='@@agent_code,') insert into WeiXinAppUser(YHXM,LXFS,design_company,share_type,agent_code) values('@@yhxm,','@@lxfs,','@@design_company,','朋友','@@agent_code,')
row.TZNR: select '推荐客户：@@opr_man, 推送了意向客户(@@arr_man, @@arr_tel,)到您的店中，赶紧打开客串串抢单吧！' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appname,'' ordercode,'客户分享' msgtype from TJ_SYS_YH a where dept in (@@agent_code,) and device_token is not null and device_token!='' and device_token!='(null)' and yhjb in ('老板','超级老板','导购','店长')

row.SQL_INSERT: update agent_list set max_gds='@@max_gds,',max_hsts='@@max_hsts,',is_share='@@is_share,',gxf='@@gxf,',agent_name='@@agent_name,',agent_tel='@@agent_tel1,',yf_xt='@@gxf_type,' where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update agent_list set max_hsts='@@max_hsts,' where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: update agent_list set agent_headimage='@@agent_headimage,' where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists (select * from orderproduct where product_id='@@product_id,' and order_code='@@order_code,' and product_mj='@@product_mj,') insert into orderproduct(product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,type_sales,cost_price,discount) select '@@product_id,','@@product_code,','@@product_name,','@@product_size,','@@product_untl,','@@type_sales,','@@product_num,',@@type_sales,*@@product_num,*case '@@product_mj,' when '' then 1 else '@@product_mj,' end ,'@@product_image,','@@order_code,','@@product_mj,','@@back_memo,','@@type_sales,','@@product_price,','1.00' else update orderproduct set product_num+='@@product_num,',product_amount='@@product_num,'*product_price*case '@@product_mj,' when '' then 1 else '@@product_mj,' end,product_mj='@@product_mj,',order_memo='@@back_memo,' where product_id='@@product_id,' and order_code='@@order_code,' and product_mj='@@product_mj,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: delete from orderproduct where order_code='@@order_code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: delete from orderproduct where id='@@id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: update TJ_SYS_YH set bank_man='@@bank_man,',bank_cardno='@@bank_cardno,',bank_name='@@bank_name,' where LXFS='@@lxfs,'

begin declare @share_openid varchar(50),@amount decimal(18,2),@agent_amount decimal(18,2) set @share_openid='' set @amount = cast(ceiling(rand() * 88)*0.01 as decimal(18,2)) set @agent_amount =(select agent_amount from agent_list where agent_code='@@agent_code,') if '@@kcc_id,' != '' set @share_openid =(select s_wxopenid from WeiXinSmart_User where kcc_id='@@kcc_id,') if '@@share_openid,' != '' set @share_openid ='@@share_openid,'
insert into WeiXinSmart_UserAgent(wx_openid,agent_code,zjlnsj,visit_hits,share_openid,add_time) values('@@open_id,','@@agent_code,',GETDATE(),1,@share_openid ,GETDATE())
if @share_openid != '' and @agent_amount > @amount begin insert into OrderCharge (agent_code,Charge_Date,init_amount,charge_amount,store_amount,charge_memo,open_id) select agent_code,getdate(), isnull(agent_amount,0) agent_amount, -@amount ,isnull(agent_amount,0)- @amount,'红包',@share_openid from agent_list where agent_code='@@agent_code,' update agent_list set agent_amount= isnull(agent_amount,0)-@amount where agent_code='@@agent_code,' insert into OrderBound (bound,bound_date,bound_type,bound_Memo,isRead,open_id,agent_code) values(@amount,getdate(),'打赏','小程序打赏',0,@share_openid,'@@agent_code,') update WeiXinSmart_User set wx_amount =isnull(wx_amount,0)+ @amount where s_wxopenid=@share_openid end
end

row.SQL_UPDATE: update backDetails set fact_num='@@Product_Num,',back_num='@@Product_Num,',pack_nums='@@d_Pack_Nums,',fact_amount='@@Product_Num,'*product_price,back_amount='@@Product_Num,'*product_price*case '@@Product_MJ,' when '' then '1' else '@@Product_MJ,' end,back_reason='@@Product_Memo,',zk='@@QYZK,',store_num='0',product_mj='@@Product_MJ,' where product_id='@@Product_Code,' and BACK_CODE='@@Back_Code,' and product_mj='@@Product_MJ,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from djquse_mx where use_id in (select check_num from backdetails where id='@@d_Product_Id,') delete from backDetails where id='@@d_Product_Id,' if not exists (select * from BackDetails where BACK_CODE='XS@@agent_code,') begin end end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from act_xl_info where xl_code='@@PRODUCT_CODE,') insert into act_xl_info (xl_code,ware_code,series_code) values('@@PRODUCT_CODE,','@@WARE_CODE,','@@SERIES_CODE,')
row.SQL_UPDATE: update backDetails set fact_num='@@Product_Num,',back_num='@@Product_Num,',pack_nums='@@d_Pack_Nums,',fact_amount='@@Product_Num,'*product_price*case product_mj when '' then '1.000' else '@@Product_MJ,' end,back_amount='@@Product_Num,'*product_price*case product_mj when '' then '1.000' else '@@Product_MJ,' end,back_reason='@@Product_Memo,',store_num='0',product_mj='@@Product_MJ,' where id='@@Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: update backlist set amount_sts='待收货' where back_code='@@back_code,'

update orderparts set product_num='@@product_num,',product_amount='@@product_num,'*@@product_price,*case '@@product_mj,' when '' then 1 else '@@product_mj,' end,product_mj='@@product_mj,',order_memo='@@back_memo,',product_price='@@product_price,' where id='@@id,'
row.KJSM: 满就送礼品添加到订货单

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into bt_list(back_code,bt_amount,bt_code,bt_date,bt_type,agent_code) select '@@back_code,','@@bt_amount,','@@bt_code,',getdate(),sfsf,'@@agent_code,' from backlist where back_code='@@bt_code,' and note_type='BT'
row.SQL_DELETE: delete from bt_list where back_code='@@back_code,' and bt_type not in ('代金券','扣龙骨','整箱优惠','补差价')

row.SQL_SELECT: select * from djquse_mx where back_code='@@back_code,' and spbm='@@spbm,' and ff_id='@@ff_id,' and djq_id='@@djq_id,'
row.SQL_INSERT: insert into djquse_mx(ff_id,djq_id,sl,mfsl,mfje,spbm,back_code) select '@@ff_id,','@@djq_id,','@@sl,','@@mfsl,','@@mfje,','@@spbm,','@@back_code,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update djquse_mx set sl=sl+'@@sl,' where back_code='@@back_code,' and spbm='@@spbm,' and ff_id='@@ff_id,' and djq_id='@@djq_id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from agent_list where agent_code='@@AGENT_CODE,') insert into agent_list(agent_code,agent_name,sjbm,agent_tel,contact_man,open_flag,brand_code,agent_address,agent_type,dist,city,prov,lmbm,kcc_price,add_date) values ('@@AGENT_CODE,','@@mdmc,','@@Sjbm,','@@lxfs,','@@yhxm,','启用','@@jypp,','@@xxdz,','shop','@@dist,','@@city,','@@prov,','@@lmbm,','900|1580|2980',getdate())
row.SQL_UPDATE: update agent_list set lmbm = '@@lmbm,' where agent_tel='@@lxfs,'
row.SQL_DELETE: update agent_list set lmbm = '@@lmbm,' where agent_code='@@dist_agent_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@lxfs,') insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,qx_cd,qx_ck,qx_dj,qx_qt,qx_ts,bm,lxfs,dz,dzjc,yhjb,wx_headimage,wx_nick,wx_openid,wx_code) select '@@YHH,','终端店面','@@yhxm,','@@DEPT,','@@jypp,' warecode,'@@PASSWORD1,' mm,'@@STS,','2017-12-30' yxq,qx_cd,'''@@DEPT,''' qx_ck,qx_dj,'''@@jypp,''' qx_qt,'' qx_ts,'@@ZW,','@@lxfs,','@@DZ,','@@DZJC,','@@YHJB,','@@wx_headimage,','@@wx_nick,','@@wx_openid,','@@wx_code,' from bm_qxz where yhjb='老板' else update tj_sys_yh set yhxm='@@yhxm,',sts='@@STS,',lxfs='@@lxfs,',DZ='@@DZ,',DZJC='@@DZJC,',yhjb='@@YHJB,' where yhh='@@YHH,'

if not exists(select * from verify_adh_list where agent_tel='@@lxfs,') begin insert into verify_adh_list (AGENT_tel,Brand_Code,contact_man,agent_code,agent_name) values('@@lxfs,','@@brand_name,','@@contact_man,','@@dept,','@@agent_name,') end

row.SQL_UPDATE: update agent_list set end_date=dbo.getdatestr1(DATEADD(month,@@yxq,,isnull(end_date,getdate()))),join_date=dbo.getdatestr1(getdate()) where agent_code='@@agent_code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from verify_adh_list where agent_tel='@@lxfs,') insert into verify_adh_list (AGENT_tel,CONTACT_MAN,End_Date,Brand_Code,Join_Date,device_token,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_CODE,agent_name) values('@@lxfs,','@@yhxm,',DATEADD(month,@@yxq,,getdate()),'@@brand_name,',GETDATE(),'@@device_token,','@@yhjb,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,') else update verify_adh_list set end_date=DATEADD(month,@@yxq,,isnull(end_date,getdate())),join_date=getdate(),device_token='@@device_token,' where agent_tel='@@lxfs,'
